mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, password, name, address, phone, birthdate) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{birthdate})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no, TO_CHAR(o.order_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as order_date, o.order_price, o.user_id, o.cloth_no, c.cloth_name FROM orders o INNER JOIN clothes c ON o.cloth_no = c.cloth_no WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT oc.cloth_name, oc.order_cnt, oc.order_price, oc.delivery_state, oc.recipient, oc.csize, oc.address, oc.phone, u.name, u.phone as userPhone FROM users u INNER JOIN ( SELECT o.order_no, o.user_id, o.order_cnt, o.csize, o.order_price, o.delivery_state, o.recipient, o.address, o.phone, c.cloth_name FROM orders o INNER JOIN clothes c ON o.cloth_no = c.cloth_no WHERE o.order_no = #{orderNo} ) oc ON u.user_id = oc.user_id
